item.description:
Help sort clothing and other childrens items

Room to Grow's innovative program provides parents raising babies in poverty with one-on-one parenting support and essential baby items throughout their children's critical first three years of life. They rely on our volunteers to help sort, prepare, document, and organize our donations of baby clothing, toys, books, and equipment. Volunteers do not work directly with the families in the program, but the work they do directly benefits them.

T/Bus Accessible: Green Line - 3 blocks from the Arlington stop

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Room to Grow
